title: Welcome to Featherlight!
text:
Featherlight is a rules-light, setting-neutral tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG). Featherlight is built to be as welcoming as possible for novice TTRPG players while still providing an enjoyable experience for more experienced players. This purpose also helps it be a great starting point for players interested in being the game master but intimidated by “crunchier” systems where it can feel impossible to know the rules well enough to be the arbiter of them in a game.
In short, Featherlight is built for you to take big narrative swings in whatever setting sparks the most joy for your table. Have fun and good luck!

title: Featherlight Design Team
text: Featherlight is the work of a small but dedicated team and an invaluable set of playtesters. This website will try to list everyone but please reach out to the design team lead if you feel that your contributions are not properly recognized!

title: Featherlight Design Team
text:
Note on AI
AI was not used in any facet of this work. Please respect this by not feeding any Featherlight content (from this website or elsewhere) into those systems. Thanks!
